name: Image Lifecycle Management Pipeline
description: An Apache Beam pipeline that performs storage class updates on instances in a DICOM Store based on user defined heuristics.

parameters.name: experiments
parameters.label: experiments
parameters.helpText: [Beam pipeline option] Additional experiments for runners.

parameters.name: max_num_workers
parameters.label: max_num_workers
parameters.helpText: [Beam pipeline option] Maximum number of workers.

parameters.name: default_sdk_harness_log_level
parameters.label: default_sdk_harness_log_level
parameters.helpText: [Beam pipeline option] Controls the default log level of all loggers without a log level override. Can be used to increase log level if logger worker is being throttled.

parameters.name: sdk_location
parameters.label: sdk_location
parameters.helpText: [Beam pipeline option] Path to custom Beam SDK package.

parameters.name: service_account_email
parameters.label: service_account_email
parameters.helpText: [Beam pipeline option] Service account email to use.

parameters.name: worker_machine_type
parameters.label: worker_machine_type
parameters.helpText: [Beam pipeline option] Machine type to use for workers.

parameters.name: project
parameters.label: project
parameters.helpText: [Beam pipeline option] GCP project to use for Dataflow job.

parameters.name: temp_location
parameters.label: temp_location
parameters.helpText: [Beam pipeline option] GCS path for saving temporary workflow jobs.

parameters.name: staging_location
parameters.label: staging_location
parameters.helpText: [Beam pipeline option] GCS path for staging code packages needed by workers.

parameters.name: ilm_config_gcs_uri
parameters.label: ilm_config_gcs_uri
parameters.helpText: GCS path to ILM pipeline config.
